title: The Game Has Crashed Please Try To Reconnect To game
body:
I am getting "The Game Has Crashed Please Try To Reconnect To game" error. 
After updating, the game worked fine while I was playing. I then logged off and came 
back a few hours later. I have not been able to play since because of this error. 

Does anyone have any suggestions to how I can fix this?

Thanks

replies.body: Running the repair tool fixed my problem.

It sounds like either bad drivers, game filles, or something else is causing your game to not render properly.  Our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide should help fix this up.  If you are on the updated client, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) may also be needed in case there was a problem with the installation.  Hope that helps!
